text: - Envase's technology's mission

is to digitize the life
cycle of a container.
We sell software that is used by carriers
to manage the movement of those containers
through their life cycle.

We are the collection of multiple
mergers and acquisitions.
- Because we were so non-standard

across these different
infrastructures and platforms,

the architectures being
different, we had no consistency

in our process, our
tools, our managements.
AWS was the natural choice for us.

We were able to monitor every
one of these systems with some

of the tools that AWS provides
that give us the ability
to even an off hours, be alerted.
If something were to begin to fail

or something were to falter
or performance were to falter,

we can jump in right away and
make tweaks to the system.
We were included in a program
called the Migration Assistance Program.
And the MAP program was something
that worked out really well for us as well
from a ability for us to scale and be able
to utilize some cost-savings that go along

with their program, as well
as some of the services
and support that go there as well.

- We've leveraged key components
and key service offerings
that AWS brings to the market.

Specifically EC-2, which is
your cornerstone for hosting.
And then from a database perspective,
we heavily leverage RDS and the ability

to have a managed offering
from AWS that's turnkey.

- One of the greatest things
that AWS has brought to us
is not only their advanced technologies,

but really the team behind
it that has come to help us.
Initially,

maybe we thought we were just
gonna be getting a vendor.

But they really became a
collaborative partner to us.

And even today, we're having
a steady cadence of meetings

on a weekly or bi-weekly
meetings that we get together.

It's really more of a journey
that we're on with them

and they continue to be
a true partner to us.
- AWS gives us the tools in our toolbox

to quickly be able to react
to our customer needs.

And that has really empowered
us to grow and be successful,

being able to join into a
Migration Assistance Program.

The MAP program that
wraps resources around it,
and then have the support of AWS
as we're growing and transforming that.
They're a partner with us.
There was a no brainer.
